episodes.title: Pink Shade VIDEO: The Cult of The Real Housewife (TLC) with Keisha
episodes.description:
Mary Payne and Keisha break down the TLC documentary "The Cult of the Real Housewife" about RHOSLC housewife, Mary Cosby.  The documentary takes us through the origin of Faith Temple church and its founder, Mama, and her husband Robert.  As the show progresses, we find out more about Mary's role in the church and the manipulation and cult-like behavior that happens after Mama dies and Robert marries his step granddaughter, Mary. 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/bjRvyelDV1w

episodes.title: Pink Shade VIDEO: Interview with the Producer and Director of The Cult of The Real Housewife
episodes.description:
Mary Payne sits down for a chat with the executive producer (Deniese Davis) and the director (Julian P. Hobbs) of TLC's The Cult of the Real Housewife.  We discuss the role of social media and content creators in the investigation into Mary and Robert Cosby's church as well as the myriad of former congregants featured in the documentary.  And we pose the question - is Mary Cosby a victim or a willing participant in the shenanigans of the church?

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/ts9KXq7uPkQ

episodes.title: "The Curious Case of the Doomsday Cat Cult" with Chris DeRosa
episodes.description:
Mary Payne talks to Chris DeRosa (Fixing Famous People) about the ID Channel's latest installment of "The Curious Case..." In "The Curious Case of the Doomsday Cat Cult" we find out the cats aren't the real issue, it's the leader! This show has everything - a female cult leader who likes plastic surgery and will have sex with anyone to manipulate them (any hole, any time), a hitman who may or may not be dead, a scared ex husband and his devoted new wife, former cult members and of course, the CATS.

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/Orzqxhb3egM
